name: Chicken Shooter
description:
The player is placed in front of a fun park tent and given a toy shotgun, with plush chickens running in its direction from four different lanes. The object is to make how many of them explode as confetti as possible. Being an accessibility project, it's possible to choose between free aiming or lock it to the lanes, adjusting as well the chicken's velocity and quantity per round.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features:
  • Score - Earn points by shooting the chickens
  • Difficulty - Ability to change the speed and rate of chickens
  • Two weapons - Can change weapon between a shotgun and a pistol

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Team:

Guilherme Saturno - Lead Game Designer & Project Manager

Lucas Viana - Systems Programmer

Rita Saraiva - Lead Game Artist
